Note: For another version in 12-line stanzas see 3075.
_description: The Lessons of the Dirige — fifty-two 8-line stanzas

BodDig102.First Lines:
Almyȝty god Lord me spareffor soþe my dayes werkys ben
                    noȝt…
BodDig102.Last Lines:
…Benefice anauncement hous or londeThe leste bargayn þat
                    he dede bye
BodDig102.Editions:
Kail,  J.,
                        ed.  
             Twenty-Six Political and Other Poems…from Bodleian MSS Digby 102
                and Douce 322.
EETS
         o.s. 124 (1904; repr. 1973): 107-20.
